ai-tha-ap40:3.4_0: I have transmigrated to the crowd.
ai-tha-ap40:4.1_0: does not hope for the body;

ai-tha-ap40:5.3_0: Moreover, I lived like the gods,
ai-tha-ap40:6.3_0: Who here doesn’t know me or see me,

ai-tha-ap40:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap40:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable junior senior venerable.
